summary: This is the Chinese translated version of the original Into the DepthsInto mod.
descriptionHtml:
This is the Chinese translated version of the original Into the DepthsInto mod.
Original page:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23087/
All credit to the original author GLArtMods. 

Introduction
The Silverfall mine is located at the south of Riverwood. Although closed for decades, the residents of Riverwood hear strange noises at night and hikers report of unusual lights. It is time that a brave hero explores the depths of the mine to break the curse of it...
The quest will start automatically when you travel to Riverwood.

About our group
ARROW&KNEE MOD TEAM™ is a neutral independent mini-group for Original MOD lovers,if you have ability to use some specialized software such as PS,max,nifskope,mudbox,zb,maya and so on , please contact us.
Our contact information: skyrimmodteam@gmail.com
OR, you can directly PM me here.
